DOC.brief_title: Study Neoadjuvant Gemcitabine Cisplatin Locoregionally Advanced Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: Patients present non-keratinizing NPC stage Ⅲ-Ⅳb T3-4N1M0/TxN2-3M0 randomly assign receive induction chemotherapy ( gemcitabine+cisplatin ) plus concurrent chemoradiotherapy ( investigational arm ) concurrent chemoradiotherapy ( control arm ) . Patients arm receive radical Intensity modulate radiation therapy ( Trilogy , Varian ) , cisplatin ( 40mg/m2 ) every week six cycle radiotherapy . Radiation deliver GTV 70 Gy 30 fraction , CTV1 60 Gy 30 fraction CTV2 54 Gy 30 fraction . Patients investigational arm receive gemcitabine ( 1000mg/m2 day 1,8 ) cisplatin ( 20mg/m2 day 1-4 ) every three week two cycle radiotherapy . The primary end point response rate radiotherapy , failure-free survival ( FFS ) toxic effect treatment compliance . Secondary end point include overall survival ( OS ) , distant failure-free survival ( D-FFS ) , locoregional failure-free survival ( LR-FFS ) . All efficacy analysis conduct intention-to-treat population ; safety population include patient receive randomly assign treatment .

Normal liver function test : Alanine Aminotransferase ( ALT ) 、Aspartate Aminotransferase ( AST ) < 1.5×upper limit normal ( ULN ) concomitant alkaline phosphatase ( ALP ) ≤2.5×ULN , bilirubin ≤ULN .
